class mytools.Excel.Excel¶

Bases: mytools.MyCommon.MyCommon

Dealing with Excel files with xlrd and xlwt module Some functions are inheritated from MyCommon

arr2Dicts(arr)¶

一个一维字符串数组转为字典

getDicts(keys, values)¶

keys, values —> dicts

getFeeDicts(sheet, i, j)¶

get a dict from two arrays such as , [“a”,”b”], [1,2] —> {“a”:1,”b”:2} intput: sheet, a 2D array

i,j, index of two columns of the sheet

getFirstRowDicts()¶

得到第一行（更新时间，数量等关键字）对应的列数 返回一个字典

比如 res[‘订单’] = 0等信息

getFoundamentalDicts(data)¶

基础数据中 货品名称和品相的对应关系 返回一个字典

getMatch()¶

compare three sheets and get the data with common keys

getNewDict(filename)¶

get rid of ” ” in the key of a dictionary read dicts from the filename print the new dicts to a new file

getSheets()¶

get three arrays from three sheets of the two xlsx files

getStatiData(splitted_data, all_species, dates)¶
输入:

splitted_data: 分割后的数据 all_species : 品相 dates : 日期，从”1日”到”31日”

getStoreKeys(data, first_row_dicts)¶

得到所有配送门店类型

init(filename)¶

set the filename and get self.total_data from the file

loadData()¶

load data from self.filename, and get self.total_data

splitData(data, first_row_dicts, dicts_species)¶

将原始数据数组进行拆分 得到一个字典 键是配送门店名称， 值是 二维数据 每一行是一个订单 每一列是相应订单的品相，日期，数量

table2Array(sheet_name)¶

把表格转化为数组形式 input: sheet_name, name of the sheet

data in the sheet_name would be extracted to a array from the self.total_data

writeCommon(dict1, dict2, filename)¶

write data with common keys into a file input: two dicts and a filename

writeDictsXlsx()¶

load dicts from json files and write array into a xls file names = [[“商家出库单号”,”运费”],

[“外部单号”,”京东C端运费”], [“原始单号”,”运费”], [“2与1对比单号”,”2减去1运费差额”], [“3与1对比单号”,”3减去1运费差额”], [“3与2对比单号”,”3减去2运费差额”]]

writeSheet(booksheet, dicts, names, index)¶

booksheet: class of the sheet of the excel dicts: data names: array, [“name1”,”name2”] index: index of the column

writeSheetOld(workbook, key, data)¶

写入一个sheet 输入:

workbook: excel类 key : sheet名称 data : 待写入数组

writeSpeciesSheet(workbook, key, data, rowsAndCols)¶

写入一个sheet，记录统计信息 输入:

workbook : excel类 key : sheet名称，这里是一个配送门店 data : 待写入数组，大小是(13,31) rowsAndCols: 数组，第一行是品相数组，长度为13

第二行是日期数组，长度为31

格式: 门店名称 品相 1日 2日。。。。。 31日 合计配送数量

。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。。 合计

writeTotalXls(data, final_data, filename, rowsAndCols)¶

所有内容输出成一个xls格式excel文件: 输入:

data : 原始数据数组,大小是 (3225,29) final_data : 处理后的数组字典 filename : 输出文件名称，比如 “final.xls” rowsAndCols: 数组，第一行是品相数组，长度为13

第二行是日期数组，长度为31

writeXlsx(table_array, filename, sheet_name)¶

把数组输出成xls格式文件 暂时不支持输出xlsx格式，必要的话 暂时可用excel将xls转化成xlsx input: table_array, array type

filename, name of the xls file sheet_name, name of the sheet

mytools.MyCommon module¶

@author : Deping Huang @mail address : xiaohengdao@gmail.com @date : 2019-10-08 10:18:12 @project : Some Common Functions Collections @version : 1.0 @source file : MyCommon.py

class mytools.MyCommon.MyCommon¶

Bases: object

docstring for MyCommon In this module, I pack some frequenty used functions

getCommon(dict1, dict2)¶

get the common key of the two dicts and get a dicts with the difference value as a new value.

getStatiNumber(dicts)¶

distill the number from the ingredients array :param ingredients:

array type, all the ingredients

Returns

dicts type, ingredients and their number

loadFile(filename)¶

load data from the file If it is a yml or yaml type, yaml module would be used, if it is a json type, json module would be used, any other formats are not supported input: filename, string type return: data, dicts type

loadJson(filename)¶

load data from the json file input: filename, string type return: data, dicts type

setDirs(dirs)¶

setup for the data directory

setFileDirs(filename)¶

setup for the filename with absolute path input: filename, such as “/home/test/data.txt”

setFilename(filename)¶

setup for the filename with relative path input: filename, such as “data.txt”

writeCSV(table_array, filename)¶

把数组写成csv文件输出，以tab符作为间隔符号 同时，应去除原始文本中多余的tab符

write the array into a csv file with the tab as delimiters. On the same time, extraordinary tabs are deliminated.

writeFile(data, filename)¶

write data to the file. If it is a yml or yaml type, yaml module would be used, if it is a json type, json module would be used, any other formats are not supported. write dicts data into a json file input: data, dicts type

filename, string type

writeJson(data, filename)¶

write dicts data into a json file input: data, dicts type

filename, string type

class mytools.NameAll.NameAll¶

Bases: object

docstring for Rename rename the files in the current directory

arr2string(arr)¶

array to string [“a”,’b’,’c’] -> ‘abc’ one line is enough string = “”.join(arr)

getCapitalize(filename)¶

get the capitalized format of a string array map function is used here filename = list(map(self.normallize,filename))

getCurrentFiles()¶

get the filenames in the current directory, with the help of ls command

getNewFilename(filename)¶

get the new filename of a old one, characters like [?()[]’”{}#&/,. would be deliminated “a .. ? b ..pdf” -> “AB.pdf”

getStdStr(filename)¶

get a standard string “ab ac ab” -> “AbAcAb” input: filename, string type return: a new string

getSuffixIndex(filename)¶

get the suffix of a string such as : foo.xxx -> -3 filename[-3:] = “xxx”

normallize(name)¶

get the capitalized format of a word

run()¶

rename the files with the help of mv command after we get the new names

mytools.Triangle module¶

@author : Deping Huang @mail address : xiaohengdao@gmail.com @date : 2019-10-08 12:25:35 @project : some toolkits for triangle computation @version : 0.1 @source file : Triangle.py

class mytools.Triangle.Triangle¶

Bases: object

docstring for Triangle There are a set of tools to deal with triangles, to get the all kinds of properties of a triangle, you can get area, perimeter, radius or center of the inscribed circle, circumscribed circle or escribed circles. You can get lengths, angles, cosine values of the angles. Also, you can get the equations of orthogonal lines, middle lines, middle orthogonal lines or angular bisectors.

draw()¶

draw the triangle, inscribed center and three escribed centers

drawLine(point1, point2)¶

draw the line with two points input: two points

getAngles()¶

get three angles of the triangle

getArea()¶

get the area of the triangle

getBisectLines()¶

get six angular bisectors of the triangleof the triangle

getCircumCenter()¶

get the center of the circumscribed circle of the triangle, which is the intersection point of two middle orthogonal lines

getCircumRadius()¶

get the radius of the circumscribed cricle of the triangle

getCosineByIndex(i, j)¶

get cosine values give the indeces of vertices input: indeces i and j, the third one should be

3 - i - j

return: the cosine value of the angle

getCosines()¶

get three cosine values of the angles

getDist(vertix1, vertix2)¶

get the L2 distance of two vertices

getEsCenters()¶

get three centers of the escribed circle of the triangle s = (aA+bB+cC)/2 p = (a+b+c)/2 p_rA = (s - aA)/(p - a) p_rB = (s - bB)/(p - b) p_rC = (s - cC)/(p - c)

getEsRadii()¶

get three radii of the escribed circle of the triangle

getInsCenter()¶

get the center of the inscribed circle of the triangle s = (aA+bB+cC)/2 p = (a+b+c)/2 p_r = s/p

getInsRadius()¶

get the radius of the inscribed circle of the triangle

getInterVertix(line1, line2)¶

get the intersection of two lines input: two lines return: a point

getLengths()¶

get three side length of the triangle

getMidLines()¶

get three middle lines

getMidOrthoLine(vertix1, vertix2)¶

get a middle orthogonal line input: two points return: a line

getMidOrthoLines()¶

get three middle orthogonal lines

getMidPoint(vertix1, vertix2)¶

middle point of two points

getNewOrder(array)¶

get the inverse order of a array with a length 3

getOrthoCenter()¶

get the orthogonal center of the triangle

getOrthoLine(vertix1, vertix2, vertix3)¶

get the orthogonal line give three vertices a point vertix3 on the line, which is orthogonal to the one through vertix1 and vertix2

getOrthoLineByIndex(i, j, k)¶

get the orthogonal line give three indeces of the vertices

getOrthoLines()¶

get three orthogonal lines of the triangle AA’, BB’, CC’

getOrthoPoints()¶

get three orthogonal points of the triangle

getPerimeter()¶

get the perimeter of the triangle

getSideLines()¶

get three side lines

getVectorAngle(vec1, vec2)¶

input: two vectors return: cosine value of their angle cos heta = Adot B/(||A|| * ||B||)

getVerticeAngle(vertex1, vertex2, vertex3)¶

input: three vertices return: cosine value of the angle the second vertix is the center of the angle

getVerticesLine(vertix1, vertix2)¶

(x1,y1), (x2,y2) (y - y1)/(y2 - y1) = (x - x1)/(x2 - x1) (y2 - y1)(x - x1) + (x1 - x2)(y - y1) input: two vertices return: a line [A,B,C]

getVertixSlope(vertix1, slope)¶

get the line with a vertix and slope input: vertix [x,y] and a slope [A,B] return: a line [A,B,C]

getWeightPoint()¶

weight point of the triangle

isOrtho(line1, line2)¶

input: two lines return: bool, if two lines are orthogonal

isTriangle()¶

judge if it is a triangle a + b > c -> (a+b+c)/2 > c

printArray(prefix, labels, array)¶

input: prefix, such as “length” input: labels, such as [“A”] array: array type, such as [1] or [[1,2]]

printLengths()¶

print out three lengths of the triangle

printTriInfo()¶

print out the properties of the triangle

printVertices()¶

print out three vertices of the triangle

run()¶

get the properties of the triangle and print them out

setLengths(a, b, c)¶

set the lengths given three values

setVertices(vertices)¶

setup for the coordinate of vertices

test()¶

test the module and draw the triangle, inscribed center and three escribed centers

testBisect()¶

test the bisection lines. judge if the inner bisection lines are orthogonal to the outer ones. There are three orthogonal pairs.

Bases: object

docstring for TurtlePlay It is module for presentation of the usage of turtle module

draw()¶

draw the pattern length is smaller and smaller in each step

drawPolygons(n)¶

draw polygons add length by 3.5 after drawing a polygon

drawSquares()¶

draw squares add length by 3.5 after drawing a square

initialize the parameters

polygon(n)¶

printParas()¶

setLength(length)¶

setNumber(number)¶

setParas(theta, length, number, speed)¶

setSpeed(speed)¶

setTheta(theta)¶

writeImage()¶
